name: Ultimate Diner Creator
description:
Manage your own animatronic restaurant!

Buy food, cake  or toys for the kids.

Get earnings from the animatronics.

Expand your restaurant to make it bigger!

Be careful of your insecurity level or you can get accidents!

Unlock more animatronics and stages!

Freddy, Bonnie, Chica and Foxy are here!

Ultimate Diner Creator is a fangame based on Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator.

Ultimate Diner Creator uses music from the same game.

If you find a bug let me know here.

For future updates just let the install program run.

Can you find the secrets?
